Package co.edu.escuelaing.framework.annotations

package co.edu.escuelaing.framework.annotations
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    co.edu.escuelaing.framework
     
  • Annotation Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    GetMapping
    The GetMapping annotation is used to map HTTP GET requests onto specific handler methods within a web application.
    RequestParam
    This annotation is used to bind a method parameter to a web request parameter.
    RestController
    This annotation is used to indicate that a class serves the role of a controller in a Spring application.
    SpringECIApplication
    The SpringECIApplication annotation is used to mark a class as the entry point of a SpringECI application.
